verses.roman:
madhyāhna karite gelā prabhuke lañā
tāhā dekhi' loka āise caudike dhāñā

synonyms: madhyāhna karite—to take lunch at noon; gelā—went; prabhuke—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; lañā—taking; tāhā dekhi'-seeing that; loka—the people in general; āise—came; caudike—all around; dhāñā—running.
translation: When Lord Nityānanda Prabhu took Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu for lunch at noon, everyone came running around Them.
